item.title: Version 4.3.0
item.description:
FocusMode 4.2.0

What’s New

  • Cloud Sync: This is experimental feature. Looking for volunteers with 2 Macs to test this out. If you’re interested, please get in touch.
  • Compact Mode: A new setting to hide the dock icon when the main window is closed.
  • Status Bar Icon: Allows you to toggle the quick access panel using icon in the menu bar.

Bug Fixes

  • Minor bug and optimization fixes.
  • Fixed dock icon behavior.
